overview:
Abhi is Product manager at Zynga, the social gaming pioneer, where he has been working on two most successful products - Farmville and Treasure Isle. Farmville is the largest social game with over 80M monthly active users. He was part of launch team for Treasure Isle, which is the fastest growing social game on Facebook platform with over 15M active users in less than 3 weeks.

In early 2009, along with Nicolas Kokkalis and Drew Uher, he co-founded Gameyola, which is a social game distribution and monetization platform company. Gameyola’s mission was to help game developers in viral distribution and virtual currency based monetization of the games.

Abhi earned his MBA from Stanford Graduate School of Business and his undergrad from Indian Institute of Technology (IIT).
